<title>Carlos de Toro – Type Design</title>
<meta name="description" content="Carlos de Toro is an independent Type designer from Spain also with work experience as graphic designer in art direction, branding, editorial design, and packaging. I recently graduated from Type and Media Master at KABK (Royal Academy of Arts The Hague, Netherlands)." />
